translation.fr: Sans rire. C'est de mieux en mieux.

translation.en: Honestly, the whole thing would be hilarious if it wasn't true.
translation.fr: Honnêtement, ce serait tordant si ce n'était pas vrai.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
No. Are you kidding? It's my own fault.
I picked a crazy.
Two minutes, girls.
Okay. Do you wanna get your backpack and coat?
translation.fr: Tu prends ton sac et ton manteau ?

translation.en: - You want a ponytail for school? - Sure.
translation.fr: Tu veux une queue de cheval ?

translation.en: Beautiful hair.
I wish we could stay home.
I wish that too.
- Wanna get your jacket? - Yeah. - Love you. - Love you.
translation.fr: - Tu prends ta veste ? Je t'aime. - Je t'aime.

translation.en: What else is in that? Anything new?
translation.fr: Il y a du neuf là-dedans ?

translation.en: Yeah, there was a list of all the medications that were in Ana Martinez's system.
translation.fr: Il y a une liste de tous les médicaments présents dans l'organisme d'Ana Martínez.

translation.en: - Insulin? - Yeah, and another one.
translation.fr: - De l'insuline ? - Oui, et devine quoi d'autre.

translation.en: Get this. Digoxin.
translation.fr: - De l'insuline ? - Oui, et devine quoi d'autre. De la digoxine.

translation.en: - Digoxin? -
- Are you serious? - Shit.
Screaming at her. Malcolm Burrel from City Council just called.
translation.fr: Vous lui avez crié dessus ? Burrel, du conseil municipal, a appelé.

translation.en: Danny will be happy to apologize to Mrs. Garran.
translation.fr: Danny sera ravi de s'excuser auprès de Mme Garran.

translation.en: Well, too late. You've both been banned from the hospital property.
translation.fr: Trop tard. L'accès à l'hôpital vous est interdit à tous les deux.

translation.en: What?
Can't ban us from the scene of a crime that we're investigating.
translation.fr: C'est la scène du crime sur lequel on enquête.

translation.en: - What crime? - Homicide.
What do you have to back this up?
The files and an interview with a nurse who was certain that the victim was given insulin.
translation.fr: Les dossiers et l'infirmière qui a attesté que la victime avait reçu de l'insuline.

translation.en: Victim, what victim? Ana Martinez.
You have no body.
No body, no autopsy. You know how this works.
translation.fr: Pas de corps, pas d'autopsie. Vous connaissez la chanson.

translation.en: Banned from the fuckin' hospital?
Hey, Kelly. Tom called to check on you.
translation.fr: Coucou, Kelly. Tom a demandé de vos nouvelles.

translation.en: I cannot get over how cute that little Vanessa is.
translation.fr: Cette petite Vanessa est vraiment trop mignonne.

translation.en: Who's Vanessa?
Kelly, do you know where you are right now?
I need you to answer me, hon.
I'm at the hospital.
Which hospital?
All right.
Squeeze my hands.
Come on. Squeeze my hands.
A little light.
Has Tom come by?
He called to check on you.
- Hey, Tom, it's Amy from the hospital. - Hi, Amy. What's going on?
translation.fr: - Tom, c'est Amy de l'hôpital. - Bonsoir. Que se passe-t-il ?

translation.en: I really think that you should come in. There's been a change overnight.
translation.fr: Vous devriez venir. Son état s'est dégradé soudainement.

translation.en: I think you should come in sooner rather than later.
translation.fr: Le plus tôt serait le mieux.

translation.en: Okay, see you soon.
I checked in with Beth. She's still sleeping.
- Jack's been pushing on his call button-- - Oh my God.
translation.fr: - Jack appelle constamment, mais j'ai… - C'est pas vrai.

translation.en: What?
There's insulin in her system.
translation.fr: Il y a des traces d'insuline.

translation.en: Code Blue. Wing West. Code Blue. Wing West.
Oh my God! Oh God!
- It's okay. -
Shit.
Hello. Sorry to bother you like this.
Yeah, no.
We need your help, Amy.
Look, I'm sorry, guys. I… Really, I don't know what happened to her.
translation.fr: Désolée. J'ignore ce qui lui est arrivé.

translation.en: To who?
Kelly Anderson. I… I mean…
Who's Kelly Anderson?
Is there another victim?
Another double- medication error?
Was Cullen with Kelly Anderson?
This has nothing to do with Charlie.
translation.fr: Ça n'a rien à voir avec lui.

translation.en: - How well do you know him? - Really well.
Do you?
He's been at nine hospitals.
translation.fr: Il a travaillé dans neuf hôpitaux.

translation.en: And none of 'em will talk to us.
translation.fr: Et aucun ne veut nous parler.

translation.en: What do you mean? I'm…
No. If something had happened, he wouldn't have been able to get a job.
translation.fr: Il ne serait pas ici s'il avait commis une faute.

translation.en: - The hospital would have done something. - You'd think so.
They're stonewalling us.
You have to help us.
Mom, are you coming?
Hey, honey. Yeah, I'll be in in a second. Just wait inside, okay?
translation.fr: J'arrive dans une seconde. Attends-moi à l'intérieur, tu veux bien ?

translation.en: Okay.
Guys, I can't talk right now. My kid's here. Like…
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas, là. Mes filles sont là. Je…

translation.en: Okay. Here's my card.
Give me a call. Maybe he's not who you think.
translation.fr: Appelez-moi. Il n'est peut-être pas celui que vous croyez.

translation.en: Have a nice day.
Thanks.
- Do you need anything? - Mm- mm.
- No? - I'm fine.
Okay. You let me know if you feel tired.
I'm not. I will. I feel good.
Amy fucking Loughren!
- Pocket Rocket! - Mm!
- It is so good to see you! - I know. You look so good.
translation.fr: Trop contente de te voir. Pareil. Tu as une super mine.

translation.en: - Really? - Yes! You look great.
- Thank you. - You're welcome.
- I feel exhausted. - Hi there! You ready to order?
translation.fr: - Je me sens épuisée. - Vous désirez ?

translation.en: - Oh, I'll have a cheese omelet. - Okay.
translation.fr: - Une omelette au fromage. - Très bien.

translation.en: - And what pairs best with that? - Chardonnay.
translation.fr: - Et ça se boit avec quoi ? - Du chardonnay.

translation.en: Oh. A large cold glass of dry chardonnay.
translation.fr: Un grand verre de chardonnay sec bien frais.

translation.en: - Okay. - I'll have the same. - Thanks. - Coming right up.
translation.fr: - Je prendrai la même chose. Merci. - Bien.

translation.en: When was the last time we were in this dive?
translation.fr: On ne s'est pas vues depuis quand ?

translation.en: A long time ago. Like, at least a decade.
translation.fr: Ça remonte à longtemps. Au moins dix ans.

translation.en: - What? - Twelve years?
- Ugh, Jesus. -
- I'm getting old. - Here we go.
Thank you.
How's Paul?
Uh, we split up.
- Oh shit. - I mean, it's not a big deal.
It was a long time ago, and we share custody of the dogs.
translation.fr: C'était il y a longtemps, et on partage la garde des chiens.

translation.en: We worked hard to come to that agreement. I'm so glad that you called.
translation.fr: Après de longues négociations. Ton appel m'a fait plaisir.

translation.en: Mm! Me too.
Just, you know, I wanted to… I wanted to ask you… It's… It's a little weird.
translation.fr: Je voulais te demander un truc. C'est un peu bizarre.

translation.en: I love weird.
But, um… do you remember working with someone named Charlie Cullen?
translation.fr: Tu te souviens avoir travaillé avec un certain Charlie Cullen ?

translation.en: Why?
Well, I'm working with him right now at Parkfield.
translation.fr: Je travaille avec lui à Parkfield.

translation.en: There was a rumor about him.
translation.fr: Il y avait une rumeur sur lui.

translation.en: That he was responsible for a death. That he OD'd someone.
translation.fr: On dit qu'il avait causé un décès. Qu'il avait provoqué une overdose.

translation.en: Uh, with what?
They found insulin in the dead guy's saline bag.
translation.fr: Il y avait de l'insuline dans la perf de sérum physio.

translation.en: They found it in a few.
translation.fr: Il y en avait dans d'autres poches.

translation.en: Pinpricks in the ones in the store.
translation.fr: On y a trouvé des perforations.

translation.en: Somebody had dosed them before they went out.
Why did they think it was Charlie?
They didn't.
But we used to get codes every night. Sometimes two or three.
translation.fr: Mais on avait des arrêts toutes les nuits. Plusieurs.

translation.en: And then after he left,
we got, like, only one a month.
translation.fr: on n'en avait qu'un par mois.

translation.en: You get a lot of codes?
Easy, easy.
You're okay. You're okay. It's okay.
- Amy, it's okay. -
You're in the ED. You're doing great.
translation.fr: Tu es aux urgences. Tu es stable.

translation.en: I checked on the girls. Jackie's with them.
translation.fr: J'ai vu pour les filles. Jackie est avec elles.

translation.en: I can go get 'em, bring 'em here.
-  No. - No? Okay.
You want some water?
Don't you ever scare me like that again please.
translation.fr: Ne me refais jamais une peur pareille.

translation.en: - I wanna leave. - I know, I know.
I get it.
We're not gonna let them find out.
Where… Where's the nurse?
Uh, don't worry. Your last pressure looked pretty good.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas. Ta tension est bonne.

translation.en: Your heart rate's been below 80 for the last hour.
translation.fr: Tu es en dessous de 80 depuis une heure.

translation.en: I saw the labs, and your troponin's high, but it's trending down.
translation.fr: J'ai vu tes bilans, ta troponine est élevée, mais elle descend.

translation.en: So you're good. You're okay.
translation.fr: Alors, tout va bien. Ça va.

translation.en: You're lucky. Could've been a lot worse.
translation.fr: Tu es chanceuse. Ça aurait pu être pire.

translation.en: - I wanna go home. - I know.
translation.fr: - Je veux rentrer chez moi. - Je sais.

translation.en: - Okay. - Hey. Saw her heart rate blip up. - You awake? - Yeah--
translation.fr: J'ai vu de l'activité. Vous êtes réveillée ?

translation.en: Bring me a discharge form.
translation.fr: Je veux sortir. Ce n'est pas prudent. Elle devrait rester cette nuit.

translation.en: Hey. I don't think that's a good idea. She should stay overnight.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas prudent. Elle devrait rester cette nuit.

translation.en: - Yeah, we got this. - I wanna leave AMA.
translation.fr: On va gérer. - Sortie contre avis médical. - Sûre ?

translation.en: - You sure? -
I'll drive her home. Make sure she's looked after. Thank you.
translation.fr: Je la ramènerai et m'assurerai que ça va.

translation.en: - - We're good. Thank you.
- - Please, stop.
Give me your arm.
So you sure you don't want me to come in?
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas que je reste ?

translation.en: I'm happy to sleep on the couch. I can…
translation.fr: Ça ne me dérange pas de dormir sur le canapé.

translation.en: - I can take the girls to school. - I don't wanna scare them.
translation.fr: - Je peux emmener les filles à l'école. - Ça les affolerait.

translation.en: Nothing's gonna happen. I just… I just need to sleep.
translation.fr: Tout ira bien. J'ai juste besoin de dormir.

translation.en: - - You're right.
- Thanks, Charlie. - Yeah.
But if you need anything…
I'll call you.
It's a month, Amy.
We got this.
You're freezing. Go.
Call me.
It has to be a secret.
Oh God.
No one can know.
I'll get fired.
Understood.
He does it in the storage room…
translation.fr: Il le fait dans la réserve…

translation.en: before it even goes out.
He injects the insulin into the bags,
translation.fr: Il injecte l'insuline dans les poches.

translation.en: and because it enters the bloodstream slowly,
translation.fr: Et comme elle pénètre lentement dans le sang,

translation.en: it could take hours or even, you know, a day to kill someone.
translation.fr: ça peut prendre jusqu'à un jour pour tuer quelqu'un.

translation.en: So he's killing 'em without ever touching 'em.
translation.fr: Il les tue sans jamais les toucher.

translation.en: Could he put something other than insulin inside those bags?
translation.fr: Pourrait-il y mettre autre chose que de l'insuline ?

translation.en: Yeah, any clear liquid wouldn't be detected.
translation.fr: Oui, si c'est un liquide clair.

translation.en: Is digoxin a clear liquid?
Could it kill someone?
Okay, and the nurse you met with, you think she'll talk to us?
translation.fr: Votre amie accepterait de nous parler ?

translation.en: No, she'll lose her job.
Do you mind taking a look at what we got here from Parkfield?
translation.fr: Pourriez-vous jeter un œil à ce qu'on a reçu de Parkfield ?

translation.en: Where's the rest of it?
That's it. That's all we have. That's all they gave us.
translation.fr: C'est tout ce qu'on a. C'est ce qu'ils nous ont donné.

translation.en: The PYXIS report's just two pages.
translation.fr: Le rapport Pyxis n'a que deux pages.

translation.en: They said it only keeps the file for four weeks.
translation.fr: Il s'efface après un mois apparemment.

translation.en: No, it's a computer.
It keeps the information for as long as it was installed. It's…
translation.fr: Les rapports sont stockés tant que le programme est installé…

translation.en: I'll pull Charlie's PYXIS report from the machine in my ward,
translation.fr: Je vais récupérer le rapport de Charlie dans mon service.

translation.en: and we'll use that to prove that he withdrew insulin
translation.fr: On s'en servira pour prouver qu'il a sorti de l'insuline

translation.en: and digoxin when Ana died.
translation.fr: et de la digoxine à la mort d'Ana.

translation.en: Yeah, see, the problem is that Ana Martinez was cremated,
translation.fr: Le problème, c'est qu'elle a été incinérée,

translation.en: so we don't have an autopsy.
What we need is an actual body.
As you know, we got permission from Kelly Anderson's husband to dig up her body for examination.
translation.fr: Le mari de Kelly Anderson nous a autorisés à déterrer le corps.

translation.en: From the autopsy, we know that a combination of insulin and digoxin
translation.fr: L'autopsie révèle des traces d'insuline et de digoxine

translation.en: were in Kelly's system and led to her death in the early hours of the 15th.
translation.fr: qui ont conduit à sa mort aux premières heures du 15.

translation.en: Right, and then on the 14th at 20:47,
you see that Charlie took out insulin and digoxin from the PYXIS.
translation.fr: on sait que Charlie a sorti de l'insuline et de la digoxine du Pyxis.

translation.en: And if you see Kelly's report,
translation.fr: Si on regarde les résultats de Kelly,

translation.en: her blood sugar just drops at 21:56,
translation.fr: on voit que son glucose chute à 21h56.

translation.en: so that is the insulin taking effect.
translation.fr: C'est l'insuline qui commence à faire effet.

translation.en: And there's slow arrhythmia at 22:15,
translation.fr: Et il y a une légère arythmie à 22h15.

translation.en: and that's digoxin.
So he was holding two murder weapons. 3:57 is the time of death.
translation.fr: Il avait deux armes en sa possession. Elle est morte à 3h57.

translation.en: Everything's there.
Wait a second. Hold on.
With this PYXIS, it says cancellations, not withdrawals.
translation.fr: Le rapport indique des annulations, pas des retraits.

translation.en: Well, it's a fault in the system.
translation.fr: C'est un bug dans le système.

translation.en: So when you cancel at the last minute, the drawer opens,
translation.fr: Si on annule au dernier moment, le tiroir s'ouvre,

translation.en: but it reports it as a cancellation.
And Cullen knows about that?
Yeah, and I saw him do it.
Insulin, digoxin. There's hundreds of orders here.
translation.fr: Insuline, digoxine. Il y en a des tonnes.

translation.en: Okay, but not according to this. This makes it look like he never got 'em.
translation.fr: Mais pas d'après ce rapport. Il indique qu'il ne les a pas retirés.

translation.en: But he did.
Did you actually see him do this?
Guys, this is the smoking gun right here.
Yeah, but this isn't.
It's just cancellations. There's nothing nefarious.
translation.fr: Ce ne sont que des annulations, il n'y a rien d'illégal.

translation.en: There's no proof of guilt. There's--
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une preuve accablante…

translation.en: Okay, he's been doing this since he started at Parkfield, so look.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une preuve accablante… Il le fait depuis le début. Regardez toutes ces annulations.

translation.en: Look at all of these repeated cancellations, right?
Look. They're not followed up with a correct order.
translation.fr: Elles ne sont pas suivies de retraits rectificatifs.

translation.en: He's had repeated orders of vec and digoxin.
translation.fr: C'est plein de demandes de curare et de digoxine.

translation.en: I mean, it's really-- It just screams wrong. It's…
translation.fr: Il y a un truc louche. C'est vraiment criant.

translation.en: Maybe. Maybe Parkfield just didn't understand.
translation.fr: Parkfield est peut-être passé à côté.

translation.en: Come on, guys. Linda Garran used to be a nurse.
translation.fr: Soyez sérieux. Linda Garran est une ancienne infirmière.

translation.en: She understood.
Oh yeah, she knows, and she's not doing anything.
translation.fr: Elle sait et elle ne fait rien.

translation.en: Nurse Cullen, thank you for coming in on your day off.
Hi, you can call me Charlie.
Uh… We've come across something troubling.
translation.fr: Nous avons détecté quelque chose de troublant.

translation.en: What hospital were you employed at before you took the position here?
translation.fr: Dans quel hôpital travailliez-vous avant de prendre ce poste ?

translation.en: St. Elizabeth's.
And what were your dates of employment there?
translation.fr: Combien de temps y êtes-vous resté ?

translation.en: I'm not sure. Is there an issue from St. Elizabeth's?
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas sûr. Y a-t-il un souci avec eux ?

translation.en: 'Cause I was targeted by some coworkers. I don't know. Maybe they're at it again.
translation.fr: Certains collègues m'avaient calomnié. Peut-être qu'ils recommencent…

translation.en: What we're concerned with are the dates you listed on your application.
translation.fr: Nous nous interrogeons sur vos dates d'emploi.

translation.en: Do you remember what they were?
June '01 to August '03, maybe.
translation.fr: De juin 2001 à août 2003, je crois.

translation.en: - Yes, that's what you wrote. - Right.
translation.fr: C'est ce que vous avez écrit.

translation.en: Those dates are incorrect, Mr. Cullen.
translation.fr: Ces dates sont fausses, monsieur Cullen.

translation.en: St. Elizabeth's confirmed with us that you were employed from May,
translation.fr: D'après eux, vous avez commencé en mai.

translation.en: so these discrepancies on your application form
translation.fr: Ces incohérences sur votre formulaire de candidature

translation.en: leave us with no option but to let you go
with immediate effect.
Wait, so you're firing me for writing the wrong dates on my application?
translation.fr: Vous me virez parce que je me suis trompé de mois ?

translation.en: It… It is in the contract.
Well, I believe I need to sign something.
translation.fr: J'imagine que je dois signer un papier.

translation.en: Is that all?
That's all.
Thank you, Mr. Cullen.
I just got news from Parkfield. They've dealt with the Cullen issue.
translation.fr: Parkfield vient d'appeler. Ils ont réglé le problème avec Cullen.

translation.en: - What does that mean? - He's been fired.
- What? - So they're just gonna let him go?
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Ils le laissent s'en tirer ?

translation.en: Well, what did they say?
That they fired him because they found some discrepancy in his paperwork.
translation.fr: Une erreur de dates sur son formulaire d'embauche.

translation.en: Well, what was his state of mind? Was he stable?
Wait, you don't think that this could make him more dangerous, do you?
translation.fr: Vous ne pensez pas que ça va le rendre encore plus dangereux, si ?

translation.en: At least he can't be anywhere near patients.
translation.fr: Au moins, il n'a plus accès à des patients.

translation.en: He can't hurt anyone.
He's been at nine hospitals. Nine.
translation.fr: Il a travaillé dans neuf hôpitaux. Neuf.

translation.en: What don't you understand?
They all say the same thing. They cover up their own liabilities.
translation.fr: Ils disent tous la même chose. Ils se couvrent.

translation.en: It happens again and again and again.
translation.fr: Et ça se reproduit, encore et encore.

translation.en: He's gonna get a new job at another hospital, and it's all gonna continue.
translation.fr: Il trouvera un nouvel hôpital, et le cycle continuera.

translation.en: You allowed this.
Don't look at me. You did.
translation.fr: Ne me regardez pas. C'est vrai.

translation.en: - Jackie, I'm back. - Maya.
- Oh my God! - Maya! Can you just say your line?
Hey, girls.
I forgot it.
What?
Don't you have the script?
- I don't have the script. - Oh my God.
Okay, I lost it.
Maya, you've done this so many times!
Okay, Alex, be nice to your sister.
translation.fr: Alex, sois gentille avec ta sœur.

translation.en: Maya's speaking over Charlie's part again.
translation.fr: Maya a piqué le rôle de Charlie.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
Rehearsing.
Where's Jackie?
I told her she could go home. It was just gonna be us tonight.
translation.fr: Je lui ai dit de rentrer. On est entre nous ce soir.

translation.en: We cooked!
- We did. - Charlie cooked.
- I helped. - No, you didn't.
- Yes, I did! - No, you didn't.
- Yes, I did! - Alex, we all cooked.
Why are you being weird, Mom?
I'm not.
- We're making something special. - It's his mom's recipe.
translation.fr: - C'est un plat spécial. - C'est la recette de sa mère.

translation.en: - Come. - Yummy!
Sit, relax. Enjoy the Mayor of Humdrum Falls.
translation.fr: Assieds-toi, détends-toi. Et profite de la pièce de théâtre.

translation.en: Should we get your mom to play Mop Hopsley?
Maya, please come here.
- Why? - 'Cause I'm asking you to. Come here.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi ? - Parce que je vous le demande.

translation.en: I don't want to.
Hey, go to your mom.
Get over here.
Get over here right now!
But why? I'm having fun.
Go to your room. Go.
Why is she so angry?
I don't know.
So I'm guessing you heard.
translation.fr: J'imagine que tu es au courant.

translation.en: She say why?
They fired me because I wrote the wrong dates on my application form apparently.
translation.fr: Parce que je me suis trompé dans les dates sur mon formulaire de candidature.

translation.en: It's been a wacko day.
It's been a wacko couple of months. Actually it's… Ugh.
translation.fr: Ces derniers mois, même. En fait, c'est…

translation.en: You know, I wasn't even meant to be working here.
translation.fr: Je n'étais même pas censé travailler là.

translation.en: I took this job because I wanted to be close to my kids.
translation.fr: C'était juste pour être plus près de mes enfants.

translation.en: Then when I get here, she won't even let me see them,
translation.fr: Alors, je viens ici, et elle ne me laisse même pas les voir.

translation.en: and then she starts making up this insane stuff about poisoning the dog,
translation.fr: Et elle invente toute cette histoire comme quoi j'aurais empoisonné le chien,

translation.en: and then this, you know…
I think the universe hates me, Amy.
translation.fr: Je crois que l'univers me déteste.

translation.en: - Really. - Charlie--
- At this point. - You know that's not true.
translation.fr: - Tout bien réfléchi. - Tu sais que c'est faux.

translation.en: I'm really sorry this happened to you.
translation.fr: Je suis désolée que ça t'arrive.

translation.en: No, please. I'm sorry, 'cause I know you've still got three more weeks,
translation.fr: Non, c'est moi. Tu as encore trois semaines,

translation.en: and I'm not gonna be there to help.
translation.fr: et je ne serai pas là-bas.

translation.en: But I can… I can help here.
I can, like, look after them, I can make sure you eat.
translation.fr: Je peux les garder, te faire à manger.

translation.en: Anything you need.
Really. Anything.
That's all right.
Did I tell you Alex blew up the other day?
translation.fr: Je t'ai raconté pour Alex, l'autre jour ?

translation.en: She just lost it.
She was crying and screaming, and, like…
She's really struggling.
I'm working so much, so…
I'm so sorry. I mean, you know, it's a lot, you know?
translation.fr: Je suis désolé. Je sais que c'est dur.

translation.en: But what I think would be really helpful to me is, um…
translation.fr: Mais je pense que ce qui m'aiderait vraiment,

translation.en: if I could spend some time alone with them, you know?
translation.fr: ce serait de passer du temps avec elles.

translation.en: Just me and the girls.
And I feel really bad saying this to you,
translation.fr: Et je me sens mal de te dire ça

translation.en: because I know that this has been a day from hell for you.
translation.fr: parce que je sais que tu as passé une sale journée.
